pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Ecological Data: Exploratory and Euclidean Methods in Environmental Sciences // Tools for multivariate data analysis. Several methods are provided for the analysis (i.e., ordination) of one-table (e.g., principal component analysis, correspondence analysis), two-table (e.g., coinertia analysis, redundancy analysis), three-table (e.g., RLQ analysis) and K-table (e.g., STATIS, multiple coinertia analysis). The philosophy of the package is described in Dray and Dufour (2007) doi:10.18637/jss.v022.i04.
